channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: OpenAI’s VP of global affairs claims o1 is ‘virtually perfect’ at correcting bias, but the data doesn’t quite back that up
item.description: Departures might be dominating the week’s OpenAI-related headlines. But comments on AI bias from Anna Makanju, the company’s VP of global affairs, als...

item.title: 9 startups that stood out on YC Demo Day 2
item.description: Here are the startups from YC Demo Day 2 that we thought stood out from the flock. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Ukraine Is Decentralizing Energy Production to Protect Itself From Russia

item.title: Starlink hits 4 million subscribers
item.description: SpaceX’s Starlink satellite internet network is expected to hit a new customer milestone this week, company President Gwynne Shotwell told Texas legis...

item.title: Runway earmarks $5M to fund up to 100 films using AI-generated video
item.description: AI video generators need to believe that filmmakers will use their models in the production process. Otherwise why exist? To jump-start the new AI fil...

item.title: The Internet Archive’s Fight to Save Itself
item.description: The web’s collective memory is stored in the servers of the Internet Archive. Legal battles threaten to wipe it all away.

item.title: Tesla’s Cybertruck Goes, Inevitably, to War
item.description: A handful of Tesla’s electric pickup trucks are armed and ready for battle in the hands of Chechen forces fighting in Ukraine as part of Russia’s ongo...

item.title: Acer Swift X 14 Review: A Hot and Loud Gaming Laptop
item.description: This portable laptop is tuned for graphics and games—but a deafening fan and high price may steer you toward alternatives.

item.title: Indian game streaming startup Loco sells majority stake to Redwood
item.description: UAE-based Redwood has acquired a majority stake in the game streaming platform Loco as the Indian firm looks to expand focus to international markets,...

item.title: The Gut Might Hold the Key to Treating Long Covid in Kids
item.description: A placebo-controlled study aims to test if treating gut issues can help children struggling with persistent Covid symptoms.
